definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to carry sb in a sedan chair/flatter/sing praises

sentences.english: You sit crouched in your palanquin and repeat the names of the gods in prayer.
sentences.chinese: 你蹲坐在你的轿子里，嘴里反复地祷念着神的名字。

sentences.english: There is no going to the Heaven in a sedan.
sentences.chinese: 从来没有坐轿子上天堂之事。

sentences.english: The litter went past Aladdin, but for some minutes he did not move.
sentences.chinese: 轿子过去好一会儿了，阿拉丁还是待在那儿没有动。

sentences.english: Often rather raising pate and looking is accurate the Jiao son of Yu prince mansion.
sentences.chinese: 常宁抬头一看，正是裕亲王府的轿子。

sentences.english: A person can be carried up the mountain in a sedan chair .
sentences.chinese: 还有一种选择到达山顶的是，坐轿子被人抬上山。

sentences.english: Traveling in China is chiefly done by sedan chair, sometimes by donkey or pony.
sentences.chinese: 在中国旅行主要是坐轿子，有时候骑驴或小马。

sentences.english: Once I dreamt of an egg. I have to bring the egg in a sedan chair to a place safely and soundly.
sentences.chinese: 我的任务是坐着旧式的轿子，护送一个蛋去一个地方。

sentences.english: I was carried in a litter during the final stage of our journey.
sentences.chinese: 旅行的最后一段路我是坐着轿子完成的。

sentences.english: She went home in sedan chair.
As I got into the palanquin I closed my eyes.
sentences.chinese: 我坐进轿子，眼睛就阖上了。

sentences.english: The Kago may touch the floor of the Kago Zone for the purpose of boarding.
sentences.chinese: 为完成上轿，轿子在旅馆区域可触地。

sentences.english: "The day is too hot to be shut up in a palanquin, " said Dany.
sentences.chinese: “白天关在轿子里实在太热了，”丹尼说。

sentences.english: Its driveway is lined with the white Ambassador sedans used by government officials.
sentences.chinese: 停车位上停放着供政府官员使用的白色大使轿子。

sentences.english: The Traveller Robot shall board the Kago when the Kago arrives at the Lodge.
sentences.chinese: 当轿子到达旅馆时，旅行机器人应上轿子。

sentences.english: The Traveller Robot shall board the Kago when the Kago arrives at the Lodge.
sentences.chinese: 当轿子到达旅馆时，旅行机器人应上轿子。

sentences.english: Why should we help fund capital Sedan Chair son do?
sentences.chinese: 为什么要帮助基金的资本抬轿子呢？

definition: (literary) palanquin/sedan chair/to ride in a palanquin
palanquin with eight carriers/(fig.) lavish treatment
reception pavilion (generally part of a large residence, and often built in a garden)
